so_39363915: pdftotext file.pdf - | perl -00 -wnl -e 'BEGIN{$a=$r=0} if($a){($add=$_)=~tr/
/,/; $r=1; $a=0; next} if($r){printf "%s,%s
",$_,$add;$r=0} $a=1 if m/Postage on Account/;'
